system.description:
Requires Flamespeaker 10.

You have mastered the art of pyromancy and have forever altered your physicality. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain 50% fire resistance.

  • If you would start your turn at 0 or less hit points, you restore all missing hit points. Once you use this feature you must complete a rest before doing so again.

  • You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.QniPNhrIl9prWmV7]{Falling Star}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.
You gain +3 Mind.
You have trained your memory and are able to use Civil Skills regardless of whether or not you have them memorized, so long as you are not in combat.

Requires Tidecaller 10.

You have mastered the art of cryomancy and have forever altered your physicality. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain 50% Water resistance.

  • You can breath water as though it were air and can swim through any water unimpeded.

  • Whenever you reduce a creature's hit points to 0 with a magic skill that does water damage, you can cause that creature's body to permanently freeze over, trapping them in a stasis between life and death.

  • You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.bInBeiF4XKmNHdVE]{Breath of Frigid Depths}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Requires Warlord 10.

You have mastered the art of physical combat and gain the following benefits:

  • You gain 20% physical resistance.

  • You are immune to @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.m4Sd3wSukc9j0o3h]{Prone}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.X6IszAPOszReXljl]{Maimed}, and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.ApravHaqi2H9tSn2]{Atrophied}.

  • You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.fn3h1jCR4YGGWLw7]{Unshakeable}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Whenever a creature moves outside of your reach, you can make a Strike at it with your equipped melee weapon. Once you take this special action you can't do so again until your next turn.

★ Grants @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.sMOJLlVWBNuVXzXt]{Opportunity Attack}
You gain a bonus to your Magic and Physical Armor maximums equal to half your Constitution modifier.

Certain statuses you apply ignore Magic and Physical Armor and have their durations increased by one round.

Affected statuses are @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.f9EgHLBdEVJ70oGg]{Bleeding}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.frCQo2l5BX8ljsNV]{Spiritfire}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.pwMjhiGe1Q35osEy]{Poisoned}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.bW1XPBQBkzJsLeSU]{Acid}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.7wfkn72lnRhuwnk4]{Suffocating}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.gVlbuZ3CMlbP1qRN]{Psychosis}, and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.V9M5OZ1zmCrxnpk8]{Rooted}.

You have mastered weaving sword and sorcery. Through performing a 1 hour ritual, or as part of a rest, you can magically bind a melee weapon you possess to your magic. While wielding the bound weapon, you may use intelligence when calculating damage. Additionally, while wielding the bound weapon, you cannot be disarmed or @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.ApravHaqi2H9tSn2]{atrophied}.

For 1 action point, you can temporarily shunt to or retrieve your weapon from a pocket dimension.

You can only have one weapon bound in this way at a time, and attempting to bind another weapon will cause all other weapon's you are bound to to unbind. If the bound weapon is ever not on your person or in the pocket dimension for more than 24 hours the bond ceases.
You have trained extensively in combat, you gain +1 to two combat abilities of your choice. You can earn this talent multiple times.
You have gained experience in all manners of life, you gain +1 to all Civil Abilities.
Any healing you receive also restores 25% of that value as Physical and Magic Armor.

Requires Spellblade talent and at least 4 points in one of the following abilities: Flamespeaker, Tidecaller, Stormseeker, Duneshaper, or Voidcantor.

Your mastery of magical bladecraft has ever increased. When you bind a weapon you can also change that weapon's primary damage type to any of the following elements of your choice: Fire, Water, Air, Earth, or Psychic.

While standing on an elemental surface (see table below) the AP cost of your skills that utilize the corresponding school is reduced by one to a minimum of one.

Surface

School

Fire

Flamespeaker

Spiritfire

Flamespeaker

Water

Tidecaller

Ice

Tidecaller

Oil

Duneshaper

Poison

Duneshaper

Blood

Deathbringer

Fog

Stormseeker
You start every round with max AP but your physical armor and magic armor don't protect you from statuses.
The range of your magic skills is increased by 15 feet.

When playing with 2 or fewer members in a party, each character gains +2 starting AP, +30% max HP, and +60% max physical and magic armor.

Double all spent combat ability points and attribute points up to the normal maximum of 10 and 40 respectively. For example, if a character has spent 15 points in strength to a value of 25, they would have that increased to 40. Any further points spent would not increase their total strength score.

On each of your turn, you can move up to 1 Action Point worth of movement for free.

★ Incompatible with @UUID[Compendium.celestus.talents.eyjVC6njy1BeJcKO]{Executioner}

Requires 20 Strength.

You are a master of brutality, striking foes with unmatched strength. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain 10% critical chance.

  • You gain 10% critical damage.

  • You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.Ts2mjGfFAa0F1a5z]{Crush}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.

Whenever you reduce a creature to 0 Health you restore 2 Action Points. This only triggers once per round.

★ Incompatible with @UUID[Compendium.celestus.talents.Y9ZMsqlZd7Hr4UbF]{Mobile}

Requires 40 Dexterity.

You are a master of finesse, striking foes nimbly and evading oncoming attacks. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain 10% accuracy.

  • You gain 10% evasion.

  • You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.zwvvv6mPrBbV9gRh]{Flourish}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet it's memorization requirements.
Your movement doesn't provoke @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.sMOJLlVWBNuVXzXt]{Opportunity Attack} and your attacks don't provoke @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.TTSollRswbZwxvie]{Counterattacks}.

All your magic skills gain a chance to critically strike. This chance is equal to your critical hit chance. When you use a magic skill that deals damage, roll [[/r 1d100]] to determine if it is a critical hit.

You gain +10% Max Health and +5% Evasion.

(Max health calculation is multiplicative)

Whenever a creature hits you with a melee attack, you can Strike back at them with a counter. If they are outside your reach or you are not wielding a melee weapon you cannot make this attack.

★ Grants @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.TTSollRswbZwxvie]{Counterattack}
